title: Welcome {{userFirstName}}

error.unableToLoadMinerSettings: Unable to load the dashboard. Please try again later or contact the CIDgravity team.

subtitle:
This dashboard provides analytics for all transactions executed by the Filecoin address, whether leveraging CIDgravity for data onboarding or not.
However, some dashboards offer additional insights when CIDgravity is utilized by either the Service Provider (SP) or the client.
The ⭐️ symbol next to a graph means the data only takes into account deals with CIDgravity-powered SPs.

Refresh rate: Every epoch
Data freshness: 10 epochs
